title: Transformers EarthSpark Cyber-Combiner Bumblebee and Mo Malto Action Figures
features: CONVERT AND COMBINE: this Transformers action figure set comes with two Transformers figures, Bumblebee and Mo Malto, that can be played with separately or connected to make two different combiner bots!
2-IN-1 BUMBLEBEE ACTION FIGURE CONVERTS IN 9 STEPS: 12.5-cm (5 inch) scale Bumblebee figure converts from robot mode to sports car mode in nine steps
MO MALTO IN HER CYBER-SUIT: 12.5-cm (5 inch) scale figure is based on Mo Malto in her Cyber-Suit
2 DIFFERENT COMBOS: combine the figures in two different configurations to make a super-powered Mo or Bumblebee!

COMPATIBLE WITH OTHER CYBER-COMBINERS: Cyber-Combiner sets (each sold separately, subject to availability) work together to create even more combinations! Keep an eye out for Robby Malto and Terran Twitch
description: Product Description There are so many ways to play with the Transformers: EarthSpark Cyber-Combiner set! Convert the Transformers Bumblebee figure from robot mode to car mode in nine steps, imagine Mo Malto in her Cyber-Suit rushing into battle, or combine the figures in two different ways to make a super-powered Bumblebee or Mo! This Transformers toy also comes an attachable Cyber-Sword accessory for storytelling power. Keep an eye out for additional Cyber-Combiner action figure sets (sold separately, subject to availability) to create additional amazing combinations! Transformers toys like the Cyber-Combiner make cool presents for boys and girls ages 6 and up. Transformers and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro. Safety Warning Ages 6 and up

specifications_table.Radio Control Suitability: ‎Role play, combine with other figures, transform the figures
